abstract.para: This chapter descripes what data need to be backup and restored.

sect1.title: Backup
sect1.para: For backups two components are required. The application (e. g. /opt/otrs/) and the database.
For backups use the "scripts/backup.pl" which is easy to use. It supports MySQL and PostgreSQL.

sect1.title: Restore
sect1.para: To restore a backup, you need to restore the application (e. g. /opt/otrs/) and the datababe.
